EmailTemplate.name: DH AU Confirmation – Contract + Free Trial
EmailTemplate.subject: Delivery Hero – Partnership Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Further to our phone call today we are delighted that {!Account.Restaurant_Name__c} will be joining the Delivery Hero team!
Please find attached the confirmation of the free trial and success fee that kicks in after. Please check your details and inform us of any updates.
PLEASE SEND BACK: 1) DELIVERY MENU 2) BANK ACCOUNT DETAILS – BSB Number, Account Name, Account Number – Online payment orders are paid out twice a month. Cash orders will be collected by you directly from the customer.
Also, make sure you inform your staff that we will start accepting online payments at www.DeliveryHero.com.au on your behalf.
We will set up your account with the following conditions: Tariff Name: Success fee for each order transmitted (excl. GST): Success fee start date: One-time setup fee (excl. GST): No cancellation Fee, No minimum contract period 2% merchant fee for credit card orders and online payment orders.
Our invoicing cycle runs from the 1st -15th and 16th - end of the month and payments will be processed within 3 business days depending on your bank.
We also have great menu printing offers available (attached in this email). If you print your own menus, we can also send you a $10 Delivery Hero voucher that you can integrate into your menus. It gives your customers a huge $10 discount. It also won't cost you anything, because we pay for these vouchers.
Here are some videos of satisfied restaurant owners we work with: 1) Erskineville Turkish Pide & Kebabs (NSW): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rhrqauloisc 2) Thai Style (VIC): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YxKvHJbupTw 3) Grace of India (NSW):https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=euEZKfocZqI
We also advertise nationally on TV & Foxtel: www.youtube.com/watch?v=TU_Cw15KMD8.
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at any time using the contact details below.
Thank you very much {!Contact.FirstName}!
Kind Regards, {!User.Name} {!User.Phone} {!User.Email}
